<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the global address expression is a part of displacement field with a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// register base, we should not emit any prefix symbol here, e.g.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   mov.w &amp;foo, r1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// vs</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   mov.w glb(r1), r2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise (!) msp430-as will silently miscompile the output :(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sampleprof/#a702f69807459cc25db5754a5f179d3fcaf6fbeb8fa9f451468611536b00878d41">Base</a>.getReg() == MSP430::SR)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1a33f1d911a725a1f81234a908d03edb">O</a> &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;&amp;&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Disp.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcoperand/#ae23b2e8269fe15dbe5ebb3394438960c">isExpr</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Disp.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcoperand/#ac9408fbc60922d24b01c1efcbd4ba52b">getExpr</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcexpr/#ae3067756d9df7843be2d25cedab37da4">print</a>(O, &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinstprinter/#aacb2bfbafa57a37e627bf1334d349bc6">MAI</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Disp.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcoperand/#a5f639fdcd3fc673fcbdb47f2e88b2b41">isImm</a>() &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Expected immediate in displacement field&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1a33f1d911a725a1f81234a908d03edb">O</a> &lt;&lt; Disp.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcoperand/#a4509c43893edc940979f690c468664c1">getImm</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Print register base field</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sampleprof/#a702f69807459cc25db5754a5f179d3fcaf6fbeb8fa9f451468611536b00878d41">Base</a>.getReg() != MSP430::SR) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">      (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sampleprof/#a702f69807459cc25db5754a5f179d3fcaf6fbeb8fa9f451468611536b00878d41">Base</a>.getReg() != MSP430::PC))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1a33f1d911a725a1f81234a908d03edb">O</a> &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;(&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/msp430instprinter/#a14168cb26800348c47e8bff835272b2b">getRegisterName</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sampleprof/#a702f69807459cc25db5754a5f179d3fcaf6fbeb8fa9f451468611536b00878d41">Base</a>.getReg()) &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;)&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
